meanings.definition: A feeling of deep affection or fondness.
meanings.sent1: I have a lot of luv for my pet dog.
meanings.sent2: The luv between siblings is special.
meanings.sent3: The luv for ice cream is strong in this household.
meanings.sent4: Her luv for nature is like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The luv for music filled her heart with joy.

meanings.definition: To feel deep affection or fondness for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I luv spending time with my family.
meanings.sent2: She luv to read books in her free time.
meanings.sent3: The cat luv to nap in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: He luv his job more than anything else.
meanings.sent5: They luv to explore new places together.
